## FOR THE BADGE

**专注于提供各种风格独特、幽默风趣的徽章（badges）设计。**

[![ref-repo]](https://github.com/forthebadge/for-the-badge)
[![ref-online-tool]](https://forthebadge.com/#/generator)
![ref-static-badge]

### 示例

```markdown
![Built with love](https://forthebadge.com/images/featured/featured-built-with-love.svg)
```

<div>
  <img src="https://forthebadge.com/images/featured/featured-built-with-love.svg" alt="Built with love" />
</div>

```markdown
![Uses HTML](https://forthebadge.com/images/featured/featured-uses-html.svg)
```

<div>
  <img src="https://forthebadge.com/images/featured/featured-uses-html.svg" alt="Uses HTML" />
</div>
